text: Hersh () refers to the first name and family names: ;Given names: * Hersh Leib Sigheter * Hersh Wolch Hersh may also be a nickname for Herschel (disambiguation). ;Last names: * Arek Hersh, German Nazi Holocaust survivor and writer * Kristin Hersh, American singer-songwriter * Patricia Hersh, American mathematician * Reuben Hersh, American mathematician * Seymour "Sy" Hersh, American journalist ==See also== * Hersch * Hirsh * Hirsch Category:Jewish surnames Category:Jewish given names Category:German given names Category:German-language surnames Category:Yiddish-language surnames
